newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Southcorp looks to wine for growth.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Southcorp looks to wine for growth.

text.p: Southcorp Holdings Ltd said on Monday that it was seeking international growth in its wine division and was on the lookout for suitable acquisitions at the right price.

"We are seeking international growth in wine," Southcorp's managing director, Graham Kraehe told reporters in Melbourne after the company posted a 91.2 percent rise in net annual profit for the year to June 30 to A$124.2 million.
"If we see the right investment acquisition opportunities ... then we Would certainly be interested. But we are not interested in paying way-over-the-top prices," he said.
Kraehe said the strategy was in line with the wine, packaging and appliance groups' broader goal of "targeting capital for growth opportunities."
